name: Re-Pear
description:
After a little too long away from home, Pearl's home is in complete disre-pear! Pearl enlists the help of handy-pear, Perry, to fix up and clean her hovel. "Pear"-up with Perry and groove to the beat to dust, wrench and hammer your way to victory! Prepare to Re-PEAR! (If you struggle with the bathtub, hold tab when pressing a key)

Credits:

Ruda Lee: Lead Design,Prop Artist, and UI Artist

Merizka Palad : Character Artist, UI Artist, and animator

Michelle Kim : Set Artist

Richard Jan : Animator

Isaiah McElvain : Music Producer

Rukeem Collins : Musician, 3d modeler, video editor

Braxton McLean : Lead Programmer

Jed Klika : Secondary programmer
